name: Breakout of Here!
description: Breakout of Here! is a game with a group of anxious and sad alien bots that must be destroyed! Use the arrow keys to move the paddle and bounce the ball into the overwhelmed bots and get rid of them once and for all. Each bot is 5 points, hearts are 15 points, and snowmen are 1 point. Remember to avoid letting the ball touch the floor! If you get distracted, GAME OVER!! Destroy all the bots and characters and WIN!!  Twist: I decided to add a GameOver and Win panel when the ball hits the floor and when the ball destroys all the bricks. I also decided to make the different character blocks different points.
